entrance.name: Entrance Hall
entrance.description: You stand in a dimly lit foyer. Exits lead north to About, east to Skills, west to Experience, south to Contact.

about.name: About
about.description: I am an enthusiastic developer passionate about building interactive experiences.

skills.name: Skills
skills.description: Proficient with Python, JavaScript, and crafting web adventures.

education.name: Education
education.description: B.S. in Computer Science from Example University.

experience.name: Experience
experience.description: Previously built numerous applications and guided teams through quests. A passage leads north to Projects.

contact.name: Contact
contact.description: You can reach me at hero@example.com.

projects.name: Projects
projects.description: A showroom highlighting recent quests and accomplishments.
